EmailTemplate.subject: Beyond The Curve. Remaining Safe.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Protect & Prevent Take the precautionary steps to ensure a safe working environment. Learn More. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Protection/_/N-c3q?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Physical Distancing
Ensure proper measures are taken to keep employees and customers safe.
Learn More. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Physical-Distancing/_/N-c43?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Practice Enhanced Cleaning
Slow the spread of COVID-19 with the right cleaning solutions and practices.
Learn More. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Cleaning/_/N-c49?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
